Synopsis: Invokes an AI to explain a given text.
Description: The Invoke-AIExplain function is used to invoke an AI to explain a given text. It provides an interactive prompt for the user to enter the text they want to explain. If no text is provided, it will use the last command from the command history. The function supports an optional switch parameter to display the explanation as a bullet list.
Outputs: The explanation generated by the AI.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Invoke-AIExplain -Text "This is a sample text to be explained."
This example invokes the AI to explain the provided text.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Invoke-AIExplain -AsBulletList
This example invokes the AI to explain the last command from the command history and displays the explanation as a bullet list.
